title: Patch update drops to 0kbps
body:
I'm trying to update my league, however for 3 days now it drops dramatically from a high update speed to zero.
I've left it open to update overnight, and when i left for school, and both times it hasn't moved at all...

Someone please help!

replies.body:
This happens to me to, when there's a big update. What I do is disconnect my internet when it reaches 0kbps, wait ten seconds, and then reconnect the internet. I think it's something to do with a static connection expiring, and thus making a new one will refresh it. Not too sure, though.

Best of luck!
